Module src.main.java.com.example.project3
Package src.bank

Class BankUtil

java.lang.Object
src.bank.BankUtil
public class BankUtil extends Object
This class is the user interface class to process the transactions entered through the console and output the results to the console. An instance of Bank Teller class can process a single transaction, as well as a batch of transactions.
